law.catch_line: Unclaimed pari-mutuel tickets from quarter horse or Appaloosa racetracks.
law.text: All funds represented by unclaimed pari-mutuel winning tickets held in this state by any person, association or corporation operating a pari-mutuel or similar system of betting at quarter horse or Appaloosa racetracks shall be presumed abandoned, within the meaning of KRS Chapter 393, if not claimed by the person entitled thereto within two (2) years from the time the ticket became payable.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 16, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 1.
